description: Smallest prime which can be written as k^2 + n for k >= 0.
formula: a(n) = A056897(n)+n = A056898(n)^2+n.For p a prime: a(p)=p (and a(p-1)=p if p<>3).
mathematica: Table[k = 0; While[p = n + k^2; ! PrimeQ[p], k++]; p, {n, 100}] (* _T. D. Noe_, Apr 01 2011 *)
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Jul 05 2000
extensions: Example corrected by Harvey P. Dale, Apr 01 2011
